name: mana-font
description: Magic: the Gathering mana symbol pictographic font

scripts.rename: for f in `find fonts/*`; do mv -v "$f" "`echo $f | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]'`"; done
scripts.build: npm run rename && rsync -avzh ./fonts/mana* ./docs/fonts/ && npm run -s sass && npm run -s sassmin && rsync -avzh css/mana.min* ./docs/assets/

author: Andrew Gioia <andrew@gioia.email>
